entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as one of the students who are part of Malfoy's group. He is described as being sized up by Malfoy.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as one of the students who are part of Malfoy's group. He is described as being sized up by Malfoy.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student who challenges Harry to a wizard's duel. He is described as sizing up Crabbe and Goyle.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and second in the potential duel with Malfoy.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is challenged by Malfoy to a wizard's duel. He is described as being unsure of what a wizard's duel is.

relationships.description: Malfoy challenges Crabbe to a wizard's duel.
Malfoy also challenges Goyle to a wizard's duel.
Ron is Harry's second in the potential duel with Malfoy.
